name: Bangkok's Hidden Treasures!
description:
Bangkok, the City of Angels is a true visual feast. From the moment you step off the plane your senses are entranced by the city’s stunning sights, enchanting customs
and world renowned culinary delights. How does one begin to uncover all of
Bangkok’s treasures in a few short days? With the help of a local expat that is
passionate about the city, that’s how! Whether you are interested in exploring
historic architecture and temples, teak structures, museums and galleries, charming
agricultural villages and floating markets outside the city or just need help
navigating Chinatown or famous Chatuchak Weekend Market, I can guide you through it all at
your preferred pace to give you a true flavor of the city without losing
precious time trying to navigate your way through the maze!
